column2: knowledge that  it  was  a  forged  document  has  to  be  decided  on  the  proved
knowledge  that  it  was  a  forged  document  that  he  was  carrying  or  whether
he  carried  it  innocently  without  any  knowledge  of the  forgery .  However,

column1: the aspect of negligence or keeping a blind eye also has to  be considered.
